summary: This code initiates Emacs with different scripts and files for various tasks such as running lsp.el and adv.el, likely for text editing and language server protocol support.

details.comment: This code initiates Emacs with different scripts and files for various tasks such as running lsp.el and adv.el, likely for text editing and language server protocol support.
details.content:
emacs --script adv.el
# run all thia aftet init.
#emacs --file lsp.sh -l lsp.el
#emacs -l lsp.el
#emacs --script lsp.el
